name: Final Profit: A Shop RPG - Demo
name_original: Final Profit: A Shop RPG - Demo
description:
Final Profit is a Merchant LifeSim RPG & Parody of Capitalism.

Run your shop and explore a story filled world as you try to earn enough coin to take down the corrupt Bureau of Business!

  • Website: https://www.finalprofit.com.au/
  • Twitter: https://twitter.com/FinalProfitRPG
  • Discord: https://discord.com/invite/VX7M58RfJn

Free play up to level 10 in the demo!

Synopsis:

You are Biz, Queen in exile. Run out of your kingdom by a group that includes your own daughter. The Fae Council can't see that your plan is the realms best chance to stop an economic takeover underway by a corrupt organisation known as the Bureau of Business.

Though cast out, you've vowed to save them anyway. Starting with nothing you'll need to accumulate wealth and climb the ranks until you become a Lord of Business!

But you'll need more than just money. Seek out allies to help overcome the danger, traps, and colossal debt the Bureau has in store for you.

Run your shop and explore a story filled world as you try to earn enough coin to take down the corrupt Bureau of Business.

Features:

  • AN RPG WITHOUT COMBAT: Earn XP by making money! Your main source of income will be your shop, but there's plenty of side hustles to uncover if you go looking.
  • SHOP GAMEPLAY: Find customers and unlock products to sell in your shop. Managing it all can get a bit hectic but there's plenty of ways to streamline and become more efficient!
  • UPGRADES: Automate your products going on display, unlock faster ways of getting more stock, change the way customers behave, and many more! There's plenty of ways to build your own play style.
  • KEEP WELL STOCKED: Some products you can buy, some you'll need to craft, or grow, or trade Mana for.
  • SIDE HUSTLES: There's more ways than just the shop to get ahead, buy stocks and property for some bonus passive income.
  • DEBT: The Bureau of Business will try to keep you down, prove yourself by building a fortune in spite of them!
  • EXPLORATION: The world is filled with things to do, minigames, side quests, collectables, unlockables, and secrets. Some are very well hidden indeed.
  • CHOICES: Sometimes in business you have to make tough choices, will you be generous or ruthless? And where will that lead you?
  • STORY: You're doing all this for a reason. The people of Faeona exiled you, their former Queen. But you've vowed to save them anyway. The Bureau of Business will regret the day they crossed you. Rise up! And become a Lord of Business!
